tweets.text:
Not only are the  @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency failing us with the water companies. They are also failing on landfills.  

#StopTheStink https://t.co/QdfH3R7TDh

Last week @AndyBurnhamGM visited the Mersey floodplain with @DebbieHilal in #Didsbury to commit to an @EnvAgency review of any further defences needed to protect our communityüëá #Cleaner #Greener #Safer https://t.co/9rhEjttO7J

urls.title: Fears for health of residents near landfill as gas levels breach WHO limits
urls.description: ‚ÄòWe have been left with headaches, lethargy, nausea and have stinging eyes from the intense stench that fills our homes‚Äô

tweets.text:
@EnvAgencyMids claimed they couldn't substantiate the odour and were adamant that they'd be doing no further monitoring of the site...@StinkStopthe #stopthestink @AaronBell4NUL 

 Fears for health of residents near landfill as gas levels breach WHO limits https://t.co/PzbSkM7cCa

#GowerNPT carrying out patrols in the Mumbles area following concerns with the large crowds gathering on Mumbles seafront, all in order, #CommunityEngagement #SayNoToASB  #HighVisibility #CommunityPolicing @SwanseaCouncil @EnvAgency  ^53914 ^55093 https://t.co/K7nskjn43k

@Tus_M_ @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg Why are the complaints rising? Surely they should be decreasing? 2212 complaints last week, is that a weekly record? The stink & health @PHE_uk  crisis in Newcastle under Lyme grows by the day #StopTheStink

Well apparently we will wake up next weekend with no odour. I find that very hard to believe with how thick the gas is inside my home this morning. @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2  you‚Äôd better deliver on this one. Expect an uproar if you don‚Äôt #stopthestink
Fears for health of residents near landfill as gas levels breach WHO limits #stopthestink https://t.co/2wXyJc9Y3K
Fears for health of residents near landfill as gas levels breach WHO limits https://t.co/C9WHRFhcL9  by @ShaunLintern
Fears for health of thousands of residents near landfill as gas levels breach WHO limits in ‚Äòenvironmental disaster‚Äô | @ShaunLintern https://t.co/IeqJli6aoZ

tweets.text: @ProfJGrey @biggeoff @YorkDalesRT @northyorkscc @EnvAgencyYNE @Rivers2U_ydrt @Jack_Hirst3 Okay thanks Jon, that‚Äôs very good to hear!

@SWPSwansea @SwanseaCouncil @EnvAgency Tonight is the time to watch as well please. Rotherslade, Langland etc. After the last few sunny weekends, hopefully the police will show their presence in the evenings, especially tonight and tomorrow. Drinkers don't have toilets to go to, so use the roads, pavements, driveways.

How odd that @AbiBrown1 would ignore 400 of her constituents particularly when this is a proven issue via  @EnvAgency monitors. It‚Äôs like keeping a muzzle on them& preventing them from having a voice ü§î #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/gQpa413D8B

People of Newcastle and Stoke, we should be worried. The 202 parts per cubic meter figure put out by @PHE_uk dwarfs these numbers from another landfill, but look at these peaks! @EnvAgency we need the data from the monitoring stations @ClareDinnisEA When do you call it dangerous? https://t.co/OAXO1TT6oF
@SianieRoo @RedIndustries2 @PHE_EoEngland @BBCRadioStoke @Cap_it_off @NewsNBC Quite literally driven from our own homes. What a disgrace. @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk
@DrAlanGreene @BhamCityCouncil @EnvAgencyMids @stwater Hi Alan. What did the Council say? Thanks

Thank you @RedIndustries2 another beautiful day I was not able to enjoy my garden @EnvAgency @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe close it down I can‚Äôt live with this headache sore throat dry itchy eyes anymore #StopTheStink

tweets.text: @EnvAgency How is the monitoring/ regulation of the stench from @RedIndustries2 landfill site going? With remedial capping & an enforcement notice things grow worse by the day-2212 complaints last week-no confidence in @EnvAgencyMids handling this crisis @NewsNBC @StinkStopthe #stinkthestop https://t.co/pPV2iL1CIV

I fully agree. Not only the perpetrators but those that stood back for far too long and allowed it. That‚Äôs you @EnvAgency and you @PHE_EoEngland Dereliction of duty & negligence has led to these health harms in our town @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/6R7dJXnnkH

And why are @PHE_EoEngland approving this? Because by standing back & watching us suffer make no mistake - you are approving this @Cap_it_off #stopthesti @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA https://t.co/O2hd9RXdfS

tweets.text:
Newcastle under Lyme community goes from strength to strength as we rage against the machine @RedIndustries2 
More donated air purifiers to help people to breathe clean air in their homes @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @NewsNBC https://t.co/r8qgsfCgyF

What an amazing end to the week!

We are so honoured to receive the #CHWA2021Awards for Climate from an incredible shortlist üéâ Our work wouldn't be possible without the dedication of our volunteers, staff and support from funders and partners so thank you all and @CHWAlliance! https://t.co/NEwJasY3mH
@HCoppins @StinkStopthe @PHE_uk @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency Exactly! ‚Äòdoes not necessarily mean health effects will occur,‚Äô is another way of saying that they might ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

It‚Äôs only fresh air if it‚Äôs fresh @PHE_EoEngland ! Support us to breathe some fresh clean air before one us dies from this! @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @MattHancock @JamesBevanEA https://t.co/XEW6XVw3OM

tweets.text: In the barren wilderness of greed and dishonour are beautiful flowers of hope blooming in our community. Proud to live in Newcastle where even the local tattooist is a total hero ü¶∏ providing air purifiers for ill,children&elderly residents @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency #stopthestink https://t.co/LpZznGNKzL

@richbeanjohnson @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids Its blowing an Easterly wind straight into the ‚ù§ of Silverdale Village,  the landfill stench is vile along Cemetery road, hundreds of people returning from work greeted with their homes polluted of hydrogen sulphide & this is in the afternoon, what's it going to be like tonight?
Still can‚Äôt believe we have to beg for fresh air on a daily basis & it‚Äôs been going on this long @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA #stopthestink https://t.co/sY68DDjCQX
Tick Tock Tick Tock so looking forward to the30th April hey @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink Don‚Äôt forget now @EnvAgencyMids a whole community & surrounding areas are watching

@Damreyuk73 @RowanN_TandA @Bradford_TandA @EnvAgencyYNE Hello,

I have reported this, your reference number is FLC-1004741365.

Thanks
Caroline

@RichardTong3 @biggeoff @YorkDalesRT @northyorkscc @EnvAgencyYNE @Rivers2U_ydrt @Jack_Hirst3 This has been coming for years. I had been helping the club with advice. It's a lot greener solution than vertical sheet piling originally proposed! Give it time. They will replant the bank for stability.

@ProfJGrey @biggeoff @YorkDalesRT @northyorkscc @EnvAgencyYNE @Rivers2U_ydrt @Jack_Hirst3 Was very annoyed to see this yesterday just upstream of #Ilkley tennis club. All done to supposedly stabilise the banks and prevent flooding. A whole swathe of trees uprooted!! https://t.co/rHTnh2pAwt

@RoddyWeller @jksmith34 @sciencerely We will monitor #AirQuality of #incinerator #noessexburner 4  construction, establish #baseline #data with #co2 #no2 #pm10 sensors connected to #IoT to fully understand operational impact #environment #ClimateCrisis @NO_Essex_Burner @UKWIN_Network @EnvAgency @georgiaes @guardian
